transcript: I don't know what the problem is. That's what I want you guys to wise my surface not turned on. Did I beat my bills on time? I don't understand.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't, I don't know what the problem is.  That's what I want you guys to...why is my service not turned on?  And I paid my bills on time.  I don't understand.
